definition[0]: the feeling of being annoyed about something, especially something that happens repeatedly or for a long time
example[0]: The heavy traffic is a constant source of irritation.
example[1]: The doctor’s irritation at being interrupted showed.
example[2]: The children are just an irritation for him when he’s trying to work.
definition[2]: a painful sore feeling on a part of your body
example[3]: The astringent can cause irritation to sensitive skin.
